text.en: Through the compassion of an ocean of victorious buddhas of the three times,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa gyatsö tukjé dang

text.en: And by the force of the profound Secret Mantrayāna’s interdependence,
text.en-trans: sang ngak zabmö tendrel nüpé tü

text.en: May we devote our whole lives to Dharma practice,
text.en-trans: dakchak tsé dang drubpa nyam gyur né

text.en: And thus awaken into the rainbow body of great transference!
